title: For Sale:  SKS Magazine Adapter
postcontent:
Slightly used SKS Magazine Adapter, fired less than 30 40 rounds.   This is the original SKS magazine adapter.  This part alllows you to remove the duckbill from your Tapco 20 round SKS magazines.  It works great and I even have a few of the magazines already converted.  This item is in perfect condition.  I will attach a link to the SKS magazine adapter website below.  The item sells on the website for $75 you can have it for $50.


http://www.thesksmagadapter.com/our-products/

The SKS Magazine Adapter was developed because a lot of potential customers refused to permanently modify their rifle or stock. They requested we come up with something they could use without making any VISIBLE changes to their stock. The G3/1 is just the ticket for doing that. We devised a "tail piece" that holds the adapter tight under the front mag tab (trunnion) on the barrel. The only modification to the stock is a very slight removal of some wood or polymer where the locking piece contacts the stock on the INSIDE. You may need to relieve the mag well also if the magazine is binding. It will be shipped "matte black", anodized, aircraft aluminum, with the socket head screw and wrench necessary to install/adjust it. The adapter WILL FIT ANY SKS type stock. It is a "drop-in" fit for your stock. It does not use the cross pin. You can now use your cleaning rod in the stock with this adapter.

title: For Sale:  FI Series Model D Colt Pony Mini 1911 .380
postcontent: This is an FI MODEL D, Cal .380, also known as a Colt Pony (Armslist does not have a category for FI [Firearms International]), with one original magazine. Made in Washington, DC, these mini 1911 had an interesting history but this web site gives the background better than I can explain: http://www.star-firearms.com/firearms/guns/d/index.shtml. Made by or for Colt, Star, Iver Johnson and FI. Locked breach and all steel consruction. Serial number CPA 023***(Colt Pony Automatic = CPA). In the middle 1970s, Colt decided to offer a .380 auto, and chose to partner with Star. The gun (to be called the Pony) was to be assembled in the US, presumably by Colt, from a Star DK slide & associated internals, with a U.S. made frame. Mechanical condition is excellent. No operational issues, and everything works as it should. I have shot cleaned and lubed it so it's tested and ready.Asking 350 or best offer. Text or call at 8 six 4 5 six 1 six 3 4 six.

Selling a set of very beautiful Wooly Mammoth Ivory grips for a 1911 pistol, made by artist Dan Chinnock. Bought several years ago and they have been stored in my safe. I placed on a Nighthawk 1911 for a picture. Very hard to find these days, especially in this material, match and grade. These are the best set I've ever came across in my years of collecting. I haven't been able to purchase the pistol I planned to place them on so I decided to sell.  I have seen similar sets go for way over my selling price of $450,  that I invested years ago. title: For Sale/Trade:  Casio Pathfinder PAW-5000-1
postcontent:
From Pathfinder, authentic outdoor gear for the serious adventurer, comes a new Triple-sensor analog digital timepiece with direction, altitude, barometric pressure and temperature sensors.

Depending on the sensor mode entered, the second hand indicates direction, altitude differential, or barometric pressure tendency in easy-to-read analog format.  The digital display shows data as values.

This means the model provides the best of both digital and analog formats.  The Altitude Mode performs continuous measurements at 5-second intervals for the first three minutes.  After that, measurements continue to be performed in accordance with either of two available setups (every five seconds for one hour or every tow minutes for 10 hours).

These new Triple Sensor models represent the ultimate in sophisticated function and ease of operation.

Solar Powered 
Multi-Band 6 Atomic Timekeeping 
Tough Movement 
Needle Indicator for Compass Direction, Altimeter Differential and Barometric Tendency.

title: For Sale:  CMMG M4 Carbine AR-15 223 / 5.56 AR15 55AE160
postcontent:
This is a brand new in box CMMG M4 AR-15 semi-automatic rifle chambered for 5.56mm NATO. This rifle features a 16" 4140 Chrome Moly Steel M4 profile barrel with a 1:9" twist rate suitable for most commerical ammunition. This barrel boasts CMMG's W.A.S.P. salt bath nitrocarbuerization treatment, sometimes known as nitriding, which offers improved wear, abrasion, and corrosion resistance as compared to chrome lining or phosphating. Unlike chrome lining, where the chrome is built up on the surface, nitriding converts the surface without build-up, so accuracy is not compromised. The barrel and upper receiver have M4 feed ramps for flawless cycling. A "F" marked front sight post/gas block is fitted, and a removable MBUS rear sight is included.

The upper receiver is forged aluminum with a flat top Picatinny rail for easy and secure mounting of optics. A M4-style handguard with a heat shield is equipped. The lower is forged as well, with a low shelf for RDIAS, and is compatible with standard mil-spec componentry. The magazine well is bevelled for quicker, more confident reloads. An adjustable butt stock and A2-style pistol grip are outfitted. Front and rear sling mounts are mounted for easy carrying.

title: For Sale/Trade:  HK P30 9mm V1/TGS LEM
postcontent:
I would like to offer for sale an H&K P30 pistol in 9mm with the excellent LEM trigger. 

The factory 3-dot sights have been upgraded with the excellent Trijicon HD night sights, orange front, dated 2013 (see https://www.trijicon.com/na_en/products/product3.php?pid=HK110O). The factory V1 LEM trigger was changed to the excellent TGS (Todd Green Special) LEM configuration. This trigger setup is widely discussed online, just google for it, but in brief, it brings the V1 LEM weight up from about 4 lbs to about 5.5-6 lbs and provides that weight evenly throughout the trigger travel. Not as good for competition shooting, but much better LEM setup for concealed carry. All upgrades professionally installed by a gunsmith, so you don't see the silly marring and gouges left behind by many DIY-ers.

The pistol is otherwise completely stock and comes with the original factory steel 15-round magazines (two of them), factory box (serialed to pistol) and HK factory goodies (e.g. manual, test fire casings, all three backstraps (medium is installed), HK lock, HK sticker). Original sights and V1 LEM springs are included.

I am the original owner and purchased this pistol as a backup to my carry gun. 

Fired over 500 rounds over a few range trips as part of my regular protocol for testing a new gun (e.g. function check, feeding of different hollow-point self-defense ammo). Shoots like a dream. Very accurate. Thoroughly cleaned and inspected after range trips. Lubricated per factory recommendations.

Good-looking and rugged pistol, great for concealed carry or just plain fun at the range. If your daily carry setup is not squared away yet, don't miss this opportunity to pick up a terrific, like-new carry gun with the desirable (and often hard to find) LEM trigger variant.

I live in Birmingham, but travel to Huntsville and Mobile regularly. I can provide proof (e.g. pistol permit) that I am a good guy and as many references as you need from recent firearms transactions. Deal with confidence. I won't waste your time, please don't waste mine.

Thanks for looking!

title: For Sale:  UBL-37 37mm UNDERBARREL LAUNCHER
postcontent:
New and unfired. This launcher does not need any paperwork nor permit ! 

I can ship within the US48, I accept money orders, Paypal as a GIFT only and Visa/Mastercard directly.

If my ads show on Armslist these items are still up for sale. 

Face to Face pick up welcome in Desoto County.
Accept cash, postal money order, bank certified check, paypal payment as a gift and Visa or Mastercard with a 3 % surcharge. Shipping is about $ 20.00 , tracking insured etc.

I will not answer questions anymore referring to answers given right here in this ad !
I will not travel to meet someone that never shows up. Had enough of those.

The UBL-37 is the B&D re-creation of the venerable M-203. It is single action with a cocking lever on the side. It boasts a positive trigger block safety. As with all B&D Launcher products, it is chambered in 37/38 mm and made to the highest standards of American workmanship. Constructed of 6061 aircraft grade aluminum and 4140 hardened steel, it is rugged while maintaining a reasonable weight.

This product has particular appeal to SWAT Launcher Specialists who might prefer to have a launcher as part of their primary armament. 
The UBL-37 attaches to any rifle or carbine fitted with a Picatinny Rail using the included Picatinny to Picatinny clamp.

Based on the proven design of the Viet Nam era M-203 grenade launcher, the UBL-37 has advanced it to new levels. As always, state of the art materials are used throughout. The plastic forward grip is now machined from Teflon stock for a sure grip and sleek appearance. All metal parts are Hard Coated or Black Oxide treated. We think that you will agree that it is a perfect counterpoint to your tactical weapon platform.


Aluminum parts anodized to meet or exceed Mil-A-8625F Type III, Class 2

6061 Aluminum barrel and parts

Bearing parts are 4140 Chrome-moly steel

Sliding Barrel Loading (will accommodate up to 6” shells)

Single Action/Side mounted cocking handle

Sights – None

Stocks – None.
Mounts to any weapon with a Picatinny Rail with included mounting clamp.

Barrel Length – 9”

Length o/a – 12.5”

Weight – 3lb 9oz

Rails – 12.5” top, 4” bottom

Safety – Positive trigger block

The UBL-37 is equipped with a 9” barrel topped with a full length Picatinny Rail for attachment to your Picatinny Rail equipped weapon. The underside of the barrel has a 4” rail at the muzzle end for bipod or other accessories. Loading is accomplished by releasing the barrel and sliding it forward to it’s positive stop. Ammunition up to 6” long can be easily accommodated. The latest design uses a machined Teflon grip and shorter, thinner barrel. The combination of these innovations has reduced the weight of the original by over a pound.

The UBL-37 will handle 37mm ammunition made by any manufacturer. Available ammunition includes flares, smoke and other pyrotechnic rounds for civilian use. If you are a member of law enforcement or the military you can have a variety of “Less Than Lethal” rounds at your disposal. These include Batons, CS Gas, Wildlife Management (Bird Control) and crowd dispersing Rubber Pellets. Rounds up to 6” long can be accommodated.

The 1911 TTT – or Triple T – is a two-tone 1911 with Nitron® slide and black controls on a Natural Stainless frame. The P-11 is a semi-automatic, locked-breech, DAO, pistol, chambered for the 9mm Luger cartridge. Ten round and optional twelve round magazines available. The Kel- Tec P-11 is compact and lightweight, thanks to its locked breech. Its ergonometry, perceived recoil and practical accuracy are comparable to much larger guns. The P-11 is especially well suited for plain-clothes police officers, security personnel, or as a secondary weapon for military service members. 


The P-11 has six main component groups: barrel, slide, frame, firing mechanism, grip, and magazine. The barrel is made of SAE 4140 Ordnance steel heat treated to 47 HRC. The slide is also 4140 steel, and contains the firing pin and the extractor. The rectangular frame is machined from solid 7075-T6 aluminum and houses the firing mechanism. The trigger connects via a transfer bar to the hammer and operates in Double Action Only. The hammer is driven by a novel free floating extension spring. The light weight firing pin transmits the energy of the hammer to ignite the primer. The functioning of the mechanism surpasses all applicable SAAMI safety standards. The grip is made of the ultra high impact polymer DuPont ST-8018. The grip also forms the magazine well and the trigger guard. Normally supplied with a 10-round double column all steel magazine.

title: For Sale:  .40 S/W brass Clean ready to load 1,000 pieces
postcontent:
All of our brass has been sorted to remove steel, aluminum and nickel cases.  We wash all of our brass with Stainless Steel pins to scrub the inside and outside to a brilliant sheen.  All of brass is then dried in a heated centrifugal commercial dryer to 125º F to remove any excess moisture.  It is then allowed to cool to room temperature over the day to reduce any chance of condensation buildup and also to allow any excess moisture to air dry.  As a commercial ammunition manufacturer, this is the process we do for all of our "re-manufactured" brass.  We have over 120,000 pieces available currently. title: For Sale:  Sig Sauer SIG556XI SWAT 7.62x39 Modular Rifle RUSSIAN R556XI-762-16B-S-AK
postcontent:
Based on the legendary SG 550, the SIG556xi will change the way military, law enforcement, and responsible citizens look at adaptable rifles. Utilizing the time-tested rotating bolt and adjustable gas piston operating system, the SIG556xi allows operators a choice of caliber, barrel length, handguard/stock configurations and lower receivers. 

A removable barrel allows the operator to select the necessary length for a given mission. Adding the appropriate bolt, the SIG556xi can be changed to any of three calibers, 5.56x45mm NATO, 300 Blackout, and 7.62x39mm NATO. Users can also quickly change out the non-serialized lower receiver, allowing the use of either AR-style STANAG magazines or rock-and-lock AK-style magazines. The SIG556xi upper receiver is the serialized part, making the lower an easy to purchase part. 

Polymer handguards accept all Magpul® light and rail kits.  Truly ambidextrous, the SIG556xi features an ambi safety selector, magazine release and user swappable charging handle (right- or left-handed). Optional receiver end plates allow for the use of either AR receiver extension tubes and buttstocks or M1913 compatible stocks.

title: For Sale:   1967 Belgian Browning A-5 Light 12
postcontent:
Just got in a classic Belgian Browning A-5 light twelve. This legendary design has accompanied hunters and sportsman into the field, as well as US and allied troops onto the battlefield for over 100 years. The Belgian version (vs Japanese version) has a reputation as being a "true" A-5 in the classic/collector's sense. This particular gun has a 1967 manufacture date.

Features include:
- 24" Belgian barrel with fixed modified choke
- Original Browning magazine plug for migratory game bird hunting.
- Great balance, mounts quickly and lightly
- Gold trigger w/ wear on finger contact surface


As with nearly any gun of this age, damage is unavoidable. This one has stock and fore-end damage, as well as slight finish wear on the metal.

This is a great hunting shotgun, a version of which is my personal hunting shotgun.This legend of the woods can accompany you afield for $675. With normal maintenance, this shotgun can provide years of enjoyment for the nostalgic shooting enthusiast.

title: For Sale:  GLARE MOUT Plus
postcontent:
The GLARE® MOUT Plus (LA-13/P) is B.E. Meyers’ next generation Escalation of Force (EOF) visual disruption laser, and was chosen by the US Army to be the solution for the Green Laser Interdiction System (GLIS) Program of Record. Based upon the original GLARE MOUT EOF laser, the only green laser dazzler approved by all branches of the US Military, it is the standard dazzler used at traffic control points (TCPs), vehicle check points (VCPs), Entry Control Points (ECP), and Convoy protection. It is designed to withstand extreme temperatures with maximum effectiveness from +50 to -20 °C. The GLARE MOUT Plus delivers nearly twice the power of the original GLARE MOUT and several additional features with virtually no increase in size or weight. These new features include: a training mode, a continuous low-power setting, high-power continuous and pulse outputs, and a low-battery indicator.

The GLARE MOUT Plus provides an immediate non-lethal response to threats by warning bystanders and deterring potential combatants.

title: For Sale:  Bushmaster BAR-10
postcontent:
Please note that there were two different runs of production of this model. The first run is stamped bar 10 bushmaster on receiver.. This series had issues with bolt and chamber; the fixed series is stamped on receiver as mod. Bushmaster .308. Mine is the second run bar10 modified bushmaster .308. It has NO issues with bolt and chamber. 
The BAR-10 was meant to compete in the .308 market against Armalite's AR-10 series rifles and Springfield Armory's M1A Rifle by offering a .308 rifle that could accept the relatively inexpensive metric and inch pattern FN FAL magazines.
**Due to funding and lack of demand this complete model was sold to Rock River Arms in the 2006 year range** 
Now that the demand has increased for this caliber- Bushmaster has came out with an OCR model. The OCR gun is a nice model but was not built to the standards of the original BAR10. 
A2- Bar10 308 - With factory upgraded Skeleton stock and Izzy Muzzle Brake, factory hard case, and two magazines.
ONE OF THE MOST ACCURATE 308s ON THE MARKET
It is in perfect working order, with minimal signs of ever being used.
The Bushmaster .308 series was manufactured in late 2004-2005
THIS IS NOT THE O.R.C.- This is the edition that was built better than all the rest to beat the competition. At the time it was the only ambidextrous 308 on the market! 
$1250 
Heres what Bushmaster has to say about this gun:
The magazine controls are ingenious, both in how they have been adapted to the FAL magazine and in how their ergonomics offer the shooter improved control. The magazine catch is a spring-loaded latch that engages the locking lug on the FAL magazine’s upper rear face. The release is fully ambidextrous. When the release is pressed from either side, a lever retracts the latch and the magazine drops free.

Like the magazine catch, the bolt release is a departure. It consists of a one-piece bar that extends across the bottom of the rifle just forward of the trigger guard behind the magazine well. Pressing down on either side releases the bolt. The optional ambidextrous safety transforms the Bushmaster .308 into the only fully ambidextrous AR-type rifle available. Bushmaster also eliminated the sometimes inconvenient charging handle latch, replacing it with a hidden spring-loaded detent in the center of the charging handle that engages a recess in the upper receiver.
The upper and lower receivers are made of forged 7075-T6 aluminum. About half of the .308’s components interchange with those of .223-Rem. caliber rifles, but none are stressed, so reliability is
